title: Reproducing our parameter estimates
output: 
   html_document:
    toc: true

---

Although all parameter values in the model can be changed by the user, the package loads with baseline parameter values. All R scripts for parameter estimation are in the `data-raw` directory on GitHub, and all estimates are built using the Makefile found [here](https://github.com/InnovationValueInitiative/IVI-RA/blob/master/data-raw/Makefile).
